title: BRIEF-Charles River Laboratories Announces Offering Of $500 Mln Of Senior Notes
text: March 26, 2018 / 12:16 PM / Updated 5 minutes ago BRIEF-Charles River Laboratories Announces Offering Of $500 Mln Of Senior Notes Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 26 (Reuters) - Charles River Laboratories International Inc: * CHARLES RIVER LABORATORIES ANNOUNCES REFINANCING OF CREDIT FACILITIES AND OFFERING OF $500 MILLION OF SENIOR NOTES * CHARLES RIVER LABORATORIES - REFINANCED EXISTING $1 BILLION OF REVOLVING CREDIT FACILITY DUE 2021 WITH NEW $1.55 BILLION REVOLVING CREDIT FACILITY DUE 2023 * CHARLES RIVER LABORATORIES - ALSO REFINANCED EXISTING $650 MILLION OF TERM LOAN FACILITY DUE 2021 WITH NEW $750.0 MILLION TERM LOAN FACILITY DUE 2023 * CHARLES RIVER LABORATORIES - INTENDS TO OFFER $500 MILLION IN AGGREGATE PRINCIPAL AMOUNT OF SENIOR NOTES DUE 2026 IN UNREGISTERED OFFERING Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
